name: 2 Cars (Remake by DoubleD)
description:
A remake of 2 Cars by Ketchapp (Google Play). The rules are simple - collect all the circles and avoid the rectangles, but after a while, it gets tricky!

-Developer: DoubleD
-Programming language: Visual Basic

This game is made as a part of a coding challenge (which means it's made in less than a day) and is a remake of a Google Play game called 2 Cars by Ketchapp. If you like this remake, make sure to let the developer know by donating a few dollars. Every donation is very much appreciated!
